title: CKA Practice: Add a Sidecar Container
description: Learn how to add a sidecar container to a Kubernetes Deployment for log sharing using a shared emptyDir volume.

intro.text: You'll add a sidecar container to a Kubernetes Deployment. The setup script creates the base deployment. Your task is to add a sidecar that tails the log file.

steps.title: Setup Environment
steps.text: The setup script has created the base deployment. Verify: kubectl get pods -l app=synergy

steps.title: Edit Deployment
steps.text: Run: kubectl edit deployment synergy-deployment and add the sidecar container.

steps.title: Verify
steps.text: Check: kubectl get pods -l app=synergy and kubectl logs deployment/synergy-deployment -c sidecar -f
